info.author: Sean Kelly
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
***************
sharesite.theme
***************

This package, ``sharesite.theme``, provides the theme (or "look-and-feel" or
"skin") for a Plone_ site that reflects the essence of the Leona M and Harry B
Helmsley Charitable Trust's website at http://helmsleytrust.org/.  It's for
use with the Sinai-Helmsley Alliances for Research Excellence (SHARE).

.. _Plone: http://plone.org/


Installation
============

Use zc.buildout and the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe to manage your
project, adding this package as an egg.  You don't need a ZCML slug because it
uses z3c.autoinclude.plugin with the Plone target.


Changelog
=========

What follows is a log of changes from release to release.  Where issue
identifiers appear, you can find more about them by visiting this project's
issue tracker at TBD.


1.0.0 — Released
----------------

Initial, released release.


0.0.0 — Unreleased
------------------

Initial, unreleased release.
